thread.title: Oscars 2017: Priyanka Chopra's backstage moments with Jennifer Aniston, Kelly Ripa and Chrissy Teigen will make you jealous! | Zee News
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Priyanka Chopra's backstage moments with Jennifer Aniston, Kelly Ripa and Chrissy Teigen will make you jealous! | Zee News

title: Oscars 2017: Priyanka Chopra's backstage moments with Jennifer Aniston, Kelly Ripa and Chrissy Teigen will make you jealous! | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: The Academy Awards 2017 were announced a day back and the whole world witnessed a bevvy of international stars walking the red carpet with utmost confidence. The Oscars event had a couple of oops moments as well when the 'Best Picture' name was goofed up. Remember the Miss Universe faux pas? Well, Oscars had its own recently when 'La La Land' was wrongly announced as the winner while 'Moonlight' eventually won it. Related Gallery Oscars 2017 - 89th Academy Awards 
Besides many highs, the backstage fun was equally awesome. American talk show host Kelly Ripa in her Oscar 2017 backstage session had many celebrities trying out some cool stuff for her. From Justin Timberlake to Vince Vaughnâ€”all created some light moments. MUST READ Oscars 2017 Best Picture award announcement gaffe: Donald Trump reacts! 
However, it was our desi girl Priyanka Chopra's 'the moment' with Jennifer Aniston that left many jaws dropped. Yes! PeeCee along with Chrissy Teigen and Kelly Ripa called on Jen and tried interviewing her and the result was hilarious. And yes, it didn't go without some tequila shots! 
Kelly gave PeeCee and Chrissy a chance to swap role as a TV host and that's how the whole fun session took off. Priyanka is really making the desis proud of her. You go, girl! 
WATCH the video here: First Published: Tuesday, February 28, 2017 - 10:23 More from zeenews
